Package ca.uqac.lif.labpal

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CloneableExperiment<T extends Experiment>
    Experiment whose instance that can generate new empty instances of its own class.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CliParser
    A simple command-line parser
    CliParser.Argument
    Representation of a command line argument.
    CliParser.ArgumentMap  
    CommandRunner
    Facilitates the execution of an external command and the collection of its output
    Experiment
    An experiment is a runnable process that takes input parameters and produces output parameters.
    ExperimentBuilder<T extends Experiment>
    Populates the content of an experiment based on results fetched from an external source.
    ExperimentFilter
    Determines if an experiment should be shown in the lab's interface
    ExperimentFilter.IdFilter
    Experiment filter based on experiment IDs
    ExperimentThread
    Thread that notifies its running experiment with it is being interrupted.
    FileHelper
    A number of helpful utilities to read, write and manage files
    Formatter
    Provides various utility methods for formatting things into character strings.
    GraphvizRenderer
    Renders a string into an image using the Graphviz tool
    Group
    A set of experiments, linked together under a name.
    LabAssistant
    A lab assistant is in charge of running a set of experiments according to a queue.
    Laboratory
    A set of experiments, tables and plots.
    LabPalTui
    Takes care of all the user interaction at the command line.
    LinearAssistant
    Lab assistant that executes the experiments one by one, in the order they have been put in its queue.
    NumberHelper
    Utility methods for manipulating numbers
    Random
    Random number generator that remembers the seed it was instantiated with.
    ResultReporter  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Experiment.QueueStatus
    The queuing status of the experiment
    Experiment.Status
    The status of the experiment
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    EmptyException  
    ExperimentBuilder.ParseException
    Exception occurring when attempting to parse a write-in experiment
    ExperimentException  
    LabException
    Top-level exception that elements in a lab can throw
    ResultReporter.ReporterException
